Visit Highfield Hall[Highfield Hall](https://highfieldhallandgardens.org/author/hifieldadmin/ "Posts by Highfield Hall")2025-10-05T22:38:41-04:00

# Visit Highfield Hall & Gardens

Plan to stay an hour or a full day to view our seasonal [art exhibitions](https://www.highfieldhallandgardens.org/art/), stroll through beautifully restored gardens or take a trail walk in Beebe Woods

Attend a world-class music performance, or just enjoy the serene ambiance of Highfield Hall. You can bring a picnic to enjoy on a bench in the garden or under one of the splendid beech trees on the property.

Our permanent exhibition, [_The Highfield Story_](https://www.highfieldhallandgardens.org/about-us/history/), tells the dramatic history of Highfield Hall and traces its journey from private family enclave, to abandoned edifice, to the pride of our community.

### DATES & TIMES

**May 20, 2025 – October 26, 2025**

Tuesday – Friday; 10 am – 4 pm

Saturday & Sunday; 10 am – 2 pm

You can explore the walking trails, historic **[gardens](https://highfieldhallandgardens.org/visit-highfield/gardens-of-highfield/)** , and **[Music Garden](https://highfieldhallandgardens.org/visit-highfield/music-garden/)** on the grounds daily from dawn to dusk.

Highfield Hall is open year-round for special events, cultural programs, community use, corporate meetings and private rentals. Check our **[calendar](https://highfieldhallandgardens.org/event/)** to see what’s happening at Highfield.

**Business office hours...

# 

A House of Dreams

**  
Highfield Hall & Gardens is not your typical historic estate. **Steeped in history yet brimming with life, it is a vibrant cultural center nestled among beautifully restored gardens, serene walking trails and protected conservation land. Once nearly lost to time, Highfield is the living legacy of a community that joined together with collective purpose. What was built as a summer haven for the Beebe family is now a home for all — a place where past and present meet, and where every path leads to something timeless.
